Html:
Hi,

It's been a long time since any code has been changed/added to this project and none of the discussion questions are being answered by the D3 developers.

Do you have any indication on when we might see some activity?

Thanks

Grant.

I'm really excited. The promised September release is going to be here any day... right? 

Davaite rebyata... Yraaa!

So is this September release real? I hope so, but don't want to get my hopes up.

 

Loving the D3 Library.

Pete (from NZ in case there are other NZ D3 developers out there).
